TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SyndicationContent extends System.Object

summary.span: 一个表示联合内容的基类。

span.span: A base class that represents syndication content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类为抽象类，不能直接实例化。This is an abstract class and cannot be instantiated directly. 您可以将它用作下列联合内容类型的基类：It is used as the base class for the following syndication content types: - - -

summary.span: 获取此内容的属性扩展。

span.span: Gets the attribute extensions for this content.

value.span: 一个包含此对象的属性扩展的字典。

span.span: A dictionary that contains the attribute extensions for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性扩展是 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 规范未定义的自定义属性。Attribute extensions are custom attributes that are not defined by the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 联合对象模型允许您将自定义属性添加到联合内容类型（例如 ）。The syndication object model allows you to add custom attributes to a syndication content type (for example, ). 序列化为 Atom 1.0 时，这些属性会出现在 `` 元素中。When serialized to Atom 1.0, these attributes appear within the `` element. 序列化为 RSS 2.0 时，会忽略这些属性。When serialized to RSS 2.0, these attribute are ignored. ## Examples 下面的 XML 演示如何将添加到 实例的自定义属性序列化为 Atom 1.0。The following XML shows how a custom attribute added to a instance is serialized to Atom 1.0. ``` Some text content ```

span.span: The name of the type of syndication content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性为抽象属性，因此必须在联合内容类型的实例（派生自 的类）上对其进行访问。This property is abstract, so it must be accessed on an instance of a syndication content type (a class derived from ). .NET Framework 定义了下列联合内容类型：The .NET Framework defines the following syndication content types: - - - - 此类包含许多静态帮助器方法，用于创建各种类型的联合内容：This class contains a number of static helper methods for creating the various types of syndication content: - - - - - - -
